features: Visual state changes (empty cup → full → steam → empty)
Ambient winter atmosphere with cyan/blue palette
notes: Canvas rendering with requestAnimationFrame for smooth particles
Steam particles: rising with slight drift, fading opacity
Snow particles: falling gently, continuous loop
Coffee cup drawn with canvas paths, fills change by state
Button states: Brew (enabled first) → Pour (after brew) → Drink (after pour) → reset
Mobile buttons: 50px height, full width on mobile, grid layout
Color scheme: #7ec8e3 steam, #ffffff snow, #8B4513 coffee, #ff0000 buttons
Responsive canvas: max-width 100%, maintains aspect ratio
Touch events with preventDefault for smooth mobile interaction
Visual feedback: button color changes, cup state animations
Particle count scales down on mobile for performance
No game mechanics/scoring - purely visual/interactive experience

userPrompt: create an interactive visualization of a coffee cup producing steam in a snowy landscape with a button to brew, to pour, and to drink

warnings.message: Visualization has interactive buttons (brew/pour/drink) which could be mistaken for game controls, but they are appropriate for this interactive visualization
Code appears truncated - cannot verify complete implementation of particle system and animation loop
